metadata.title: CVE-2017-5188 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The bs_worker code in open build service before 20170320 followed relativesymlinks, allowing reading of files outside of the package source directoryduring build, allowing leakage of private information.

criterions.comment: open-build-service: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
